metadata.title: CVE-2024-42065 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe: Add a NULL check in xe_ttm_stolen_mgr_initAdd an explicit check to ensure that the mgr is not NULL.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
